Tom thought it was a funny idea, but he said, "Okay, let's try it!"
Sue asked the pot, "Will you please open?" To their surprise, the pot answered, "Yes, I will open if you say the magic word." Sue and Tom looked at each other, not knowing what the magic word was. They tried many words like "please", "open", and "now". But the pot did not open.
Then, Tom remembered a word his mom always told him to say when he wanted something. He said, "Pot, will you open if I say 'thank you'?"

Once upon a time, a soft cat named Kitty lived with her mother. They loved to play and hug each other. Kitty and her mother were very happy.
One day, when they were playing, Kitty saw a big box. She went to the box and tried to open it. Her mother told her to be careful. Kitty paused for a moment, then she opened the box.

But Sam does not listen. He goes faster and faster, until he hits a fat pillow on the sofa. His car flies in the air and lands on the floor. It breaks into two pieces.
"Oh no, my car!" Sam cries, picking up the pieces. He feels sad and angry.
"I told you to slow down, Sam. Now your car is broken. You should be more careful." Tim says, shaking his head.
Sam looks at Tim and his truck. He has an idea. He throws one piece of his car at Tim's truck. It hits the truck and makes a dent.

Tom wanted the shiny symbol, so he tried to pull it off the tree. He pulled and pulled, but the symbol would not come off. Tom's friends told him to stop, but he did not listen. He wanted the shiny symbol so much that he kept pulling.
Tom pulled so hard that he fell down and hurt himself. He cried and his friends came to help him. Tom learned that he should listen to his friends and not be greedy. The moral of the story is to listen to others and not let greed take over.

, there was an intelligent dog named Max. Max loved to play in the sun and soak in the warm water. One day, Max saw a shiny glass on the table.
Max said to his friend, the cat, "I want to see the shiny glass up close." The cat said, "Be careful, Max. The glass can break." Max did not listen and jumped on the table.
Max was too excited and hit the glass. The glass broke and fell on Max. Max was hurt and sad. The cat said, "I told you to be careful, Max." Max learned to listen to his friends.

a time, a little boy named Tom and his mommy went on an adventure to a faraway land. It was an interesting place because the tip of the land was surrounded by a big, blue sea.
